block.p: In the following reports, the "listed at" price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from the most recent listing to contract.

$775,000 721 Fifth Avenue (56th St.) (Trump Tower) 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, c/a, 3 exposures, Central Park view; common charges $1,230, taxes $10,992, listed at $775,000, 24 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)
In the following reports, the "listed at" price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from the most recent listing to contract.

$775,000 721 Fifth Avenue (56th St.) (Trump Tower) 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, c/a, 3 exposures, Central Park view; common charges $1,230, taxes $10,992, listed at $775,000, 24 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$725,000 140 East 28th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. penthouse co-op in a prewar building; renovated kitchen, marble bath, gas fireplace, greenhouse, 2 terraces, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,291, 52% tax-deductible, listed at $725,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker/Hunt Kennedy)

$850,000 404 East 66th Street (Hardenbrook House) 2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,265-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, marble baths, fireplace, corner unit with wraparound terrace, washer/dryer in unit; common charges $745, taxes $8,136, listed at $875,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$600,000 425 East 86th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,200-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; manned elevator, dining room, windowed kitchen, high beamed ceilings, fireplace, 2 exposures, original molding and detail; maintenance $1,360, 52% tax-deductible, listed at $625,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$338,000 60 Riverside Drive (76th St.) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 750-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, high ceilings, h/w floors, terrace, west exposure, Hudson River view; maintenance $774, 45% tax-deductible, listed at $338,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

$200,000 670 Minneford Avenue 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 60-year-old bungalow; eat-in kitchen, den, front porch, full basement, 25- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $1,150, listed at $210,000, 1 week on market (Broker: City Island Real Estate)

$44,000 3520 Tryon Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 825-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; elevator, dining foyer, h/w floors; maintenance $474, 50% tax-deductible, listed at $46,500, 17 weeks on market (Broker: Jeskill)

$193,000 229 Frost Street 2-family, 70-year-old attached house; 3 bedrooms in primary unit; 1 bedroom in other; 1 bath in each; full basement, needs renovation; taxes $700, listed at $210,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Kline)

$525,000 47 Plaza Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,700-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, manned elevator, dining room, renovated kitchen and bath, Manhattan skyline view; maintenance $1,473, 30% tax-deductible, listed at $529,000, 17 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Hunt Kennedy Cranford; Aguayo & Huebener)

$189,000 261 Prospect Park West 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 800-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar limestone building; renovated kitchen and bath, oak floors, patio and garden; common charges $244, taxes $347, listed at $189,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$425,000 159-09 32nd Street 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 70-year-old detached house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, fireplace, new windows, 1-car garage, 55- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $2,170, listed at $445,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$277,000 67-129 Dartmouth Street 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 55-year-old attached town house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 1-car garage, 18- by 100-ft. lot; taxes $1,700, listed at $285,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Kingdom)
$215,000 381 Lyndale Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 44-year-old ranch; eat-in kitchen, 1-car garage, 65- by 90-ft. lot; taxes $1,482, listed at $215,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Salmon)

$420,000 41 Sagamore Road 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 86-year-old town house; front and back terraces, entry hall, fireplace, dining room, family room, 2 parking spaces; taxes $10,200, listed at $450,000, 16 weeks on market (Brokers: Houlihan/Lawrence; Prudential Ragette)

$700,000 9 Janet Terrace 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 34-year-old colonial; modern eat-in kitchen, family room, sauna, patio, attached 2-car garage, full finished basement, .62 acres; taxes $14,665, listed at $719,000, 29 weeks on market (Brokers: Peter J. Riolo; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$257,500 75 Joyce Road 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 49-year-old Cape Cod; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, eat-in kitchen, powder room, attached garage, fenced yard; taxes $6,575, listed at $279,000, 14 weeks on market (Brokers: Claire D. Leone Associates; Prudential Ragette)

$682,500 2 Rectory Lane 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 62-year-old colonial; 1,000-sq.-ft. wraparound patio, modern eat-in kitchen, family room, office, playroom, .40 acre; taxes $14,300, listed at $699,000, 27 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Ragette; Prudential Centennial)

$250,000 9 River Road (Palmer Point) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 960-sq.-ft. condo in a 20-year-old building; dining area, fireplace, terrace, 1-car garage; common charges $290, taxes $3,785, listed at $259,000, 21 weeks on market (Brokers: Ogilvy & Associates; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)

$525,000 402 Northwood Drive 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 6-year-old colonial; 2-story entry foyer, dining room, family room, study, library, 2-car garage, 1.6-acre lot; taxes $6,668, listed at $525,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: William Orange)

$450,000 24 Deepwood Road 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 15-year-old contemporary; great room w/fireplace, dining area, h/w floors, c/a, Jacuzzi, 1-car garage, 2.28-acre lot; taxes $7,164, listed at $465,000, 45 weeks on market (Brokers: William Pitt; William Raveis)

$520,000 24 Elm Street 5-bedroom, 5-bath, 60-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, finished basement, patio, 1-car garage; taxes $5,100, listed at $599,999, 7 weeks on market (Broker: Great Neck Realty, Better Homes and Gardens)

$250,000 27 Irving Place 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 75-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, basement, attic, 2 porches; taxes $2,800, listed at $245,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman-Jane Hayes)

$277,000 54 Fieldstone Drive 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 49-year-old Cape Cod; finished basement, deck, 1-car garage; taxes $4,600, listed at $319,000, 5 weeks on market (Brokers: ERA Gatewood; Century 21 Benjamin Birch Tree)

$330,000 26 Bradford Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 50-year-old Cape Cod; porch, fireplace, den, eat-in kitchen, dining room; taxes $7,978, listed at $330,000, 1 week on market (Brokers: Atlantic Real Estate Better Homes & Gardens; Weichert)

$176,000 38 New Friendship Road 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 11-year-old colonial; 2-car garage, eat-in kitchen, fireplace; taxes $4,005, listed at $179,900, 5 months on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)

$250,000 893 Somerset Court 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 9-year-old town house condo; c/a, 1-car garage, cathedral ceilings; common charges $205, taxes $4,342, listed at $254,900, 1 day on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)

$175,000 116 Buckingham Avenue 5-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 72-year-old Tudor; 2-car garage, family room, full basement, eat-in kitchen, fireplace, library; taxes $5,677, listed at $179,900, 3 months on market (Broker: Weidel)
